description: beaded necklace with beaded amulet attached; beads on necklace predominantly red with white, black, yellow, green and blue; amulet in shape of elongated lozenge with red, yellow, dark and light blue and white solid areas of beads; large glass beads attached to bottom sides and top of amulet
text: This amulet necklace would have been worn by an Apsaalooka mother to honor the sacred connection between her and her child. Some amulets of this type contain the child's umbilicus.
title: Amulet
